title: People of Sydney!
body:
I would really love to have a viewing party for the OPL Grandfinal.
Any other Sydney-siders or people within travel distance interested?

I just want to throw the idea out there, if others are keen.

No ideas about where so feel free to brainstorm.

replies.body: Sky, I'd be keen. I'll ask Marauder if he knows anything ATM.

Awesome!

I'll make snacks from everyone, like nutella fair bread :D.
Spawn Point Bar will be playing the OPL finals on the big screen but they are also having a Hearthstone event that night.
A bar also sets an age restriction, I'd rather not do that if I can!

... Do people actually do this?

I may watch the finals, but I'm definitely not watching it with a group of guys I've never met before.
Well it's healthy. League is what you like and it's good (and easy) to find people with the same hobby/interests.. Win/win

Being social is fun! 
I's love to shout and cheer with a group of guys and girls, adds to hype of the day.
